page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: {How People Get To Work 64 people go by car.19 people walk to work.4 people go by train.3 people go by motorbikes.1 goes by bicycle. If the road is blocked by snow 11 people cannot get to work,37 can go by train and 23 can walk. {Vehicles} In Edale at present there are 104 cars,60 bicycles, 25 Land-Rovers,10 motor bikes,7 vans,1 lorry. {Buses} There is no daily bus service,but there are two journeys from Sheffield on Sundays. {Trains} There are 9 daily train journeys from Edale to New Mills. There are 10 daily train journeys from Edale to Sheffield.
